content:
At 10:30 Russian troops fired at the village of Kurilovka, Kupyansk district of Kharkiv region.

About thisreportedThe head of Kharkiv Ova Oleg Synigubov.

The terrorist action was killed by a civilian 67-year-old woman. Profile services work on the ground.

As reported by the Armyinform, last day Russianbeat artillery and mortarsOn 17 settlements of the region, another six were caused by air strikes.

In addition, during the day, Ukrainian defenders repelled 7 enemy attacks in the Sinkivka and Tabayivka area.
title: Russian troops fired Kupyansky district, a woman was killed
description: This was reported by the head of Kharkiv Ova Oleg Synigubov. Due to terrorist actions ...
author: Army Inform
